mapper.sql: u.id,u.uuid,u.status,u.createTime,u.updateTime,u.code,u.name,u.sort,u.url,u.type,u.clazz,u.ico,u.remark,u.screenType, u.host,u.messageEncAlg,u.messageEncKey,u.signatureAlg,u.signatureKey,u.timeout,u.mappingType,u.logout,u.authAddr,u.authPassMode,u.authSignAlg,u.authSignKey, c.id AS ownerId,c.uuid AS ownerUuid, c.name AS ownerName
mapper.select:
select
from um_application u where u.id=#{id}

SELECT
FROM um_application u WHERE u.id = #{id} and u.uuid=#{uuid} and u.status <> 9

select
from um_application u where u.code=#{code}
mapper.update: update um_application set messageEncKey=#{entity.messageEncKey},messageEncAlg=#{entity.messageEncAlg},signatureKey=#{entity.signatureKey},signatureAlg=#{entity.signatureAlg},host=#{entity.host},timeout=#{entity.timeout} ,updateTime=now() where id=#{entity.id} and uuid=#{entity.uuid}

update um_application set authAddr=#{entity.authAddr},authPassMode=#{entity.authPassMode},authSignAlg=#{entity.authSignAlg},authSignKey=#{entity.authSignKey},updateTime=now() where id=#{entity.id} and uuid=#{entity.uuid}
update um_application set status=#{status},updateTime=now() where id=#{id} and uuid=#{uuid}
update um_application set ico=#{ico},updateTime=now() where id=#{app.id} and uuid=#{app.uuid}
mapper.delete: update um_application set status=9,updateTime=now() where id=#{id} and uuid=#{uuid}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM um_application u join um_yw_rel_role_app relapp on u.id=relapp.appId join um_yw_rel_role_user reluser on reluser.roleId=relapp.roleId WHERE u.status=0 And u.clazz=0 AND reluser.userId = #{ywUserId}

SELECT
FROM um_application u join um_kh_rel_role_app relapp on u.id=relapp.appId join um_kh_rel_role_user reluser on reluser.roleId=relapp.roleId WHERE u.status=0 And u.clazz=1 AND reluser.userId = #{khUserId}
